description.p: This was one of the first comics which got a decidedly bad reaction online. It's just not very good. I think I was sick or something at the time and didn't put much energy into it. At the time I told myself it didn't bother me, but it did.

transcript.p: Lee gets on a bike. He starts riding with a smile. Then he turns 90 degrees to the right and faceplants into the ground.
